forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
